properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Raajaadhi raajaa raave raaju yesu raajyamela raave Vairaajulaku raajuvai raave ravikoti teja yesu raave O....... megha vaahanambu meeda vegame O....... minchu vaibavambuthoda vegame{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O....... Bhujanmbulella theri choodagaa O....... nee janambu swagathambu neeyagaa Nee raajya sthaapanambu cheya Bhuraajulella goolipova Bhoomiyakashambu maaripova Nee mahaaprabavamuna vega{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}aa... akasamuna dootalaarbhaatimpagaa Aa... aadi baktha sangha samethambugaa Aakaasambu madhya veedhilona Ekamai mahasabacheya Yesunaadha! needu mahimalona Makade mahaanandamouga{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O....... parama yerusalemu punya sangamaa ! O....... gorrepilla kristhu punya sangamaa ! Parama dootalaaraa ! bhakthulaaraa ! paulapostulaaraa ! Peddalara ! goriyapilla yesuraju pera Krotha geethametthi paadaraaraa{/lang-eng}
